WorkItem.ClosedComment: It was using the warrior version of the proc, fixed to use the hunter version of the proc.Note: See http://www.wowhead.com/?item=50362#comments:id=910652 for list of procs per class.  Not listed are Shamans, who can proc Agility, Armor Penetration, or Attack Power.
WorkItem.Description: It seems that the proc for hunters is set to proc ArP, which is not correct.  The trinket procs 600 agility, 600 crit rating, or 1200 attack power.  Instead of giving 155 ArP, it gives 169.076.

Comments.Message: Note: nobody procs armor penetration anymore.  All arp procs have been changed to use haste instead, according to the Jan 6th in-game changes.
